item.title: How to Grow Coleus from Cuttings Water Propagation
item.dc:creator: Neil Mahaseth
item.description:
In this video learn about how to grow the beautiful ornamental plant coleus and clone it from cutting using water propagation. This is a step-by-step guide with plant growth updates...

The post How to Grow Coleus from Cuttings Water Propagation appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
In this video learn about how to grow the beautiful ornamental plant coleus and clone it from cutting using water propagation. This is a step-by-step guide with plant growth updates of 3 months.

▼Scan @ Video Index▼

  • 00:00 Intro
  • 00:57 Coleus Plant Information
  • 2:55 Type and Length of Coleus Cuttings
  • 4:52 Cutting Growing Container
  • 5:55 Sunlight, Temperature, and Time Required
  • 6:40 Cutting Update after 15 Days
  • 8:04 Coleus Cutting Soil Transplant
  • 9:14 Coleus Growth after 3 Mont

I hope friends, you liked this video guide on How to Grow Coleus. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it. If you liked this, you might also like our other gardening-related content. Make sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel or join our mailing list to be alerted as soon as a new video is released. Thanks for watching friends see you later bye.

The post How to Grow Coleus from Cuttings Water Propagation appeared first on Plants My Love.
